about_the_game:
The Monk is the exciting game in metroidvania genre where you dive to a brutality cyberpunk world with many implants, technology, corporates and gangs.

In this world you will play as the monk who awakes in the cyberpunk world and he doesn't remember his background. Your mission is to discover the city, collect implants, improve your abilities, discover new areas and unravel the mysteries of your origins.

The game provides an open world with many areas. Each area has a unique style and an atmosphere. You will find different enemies and bosses that requires a unique strategy to defeat.

An implant system lets you to setup your own the monk as you want by adding new abilities and improve existing ones. This adds a strategy layer because you have to decide which implants more helpful than other

In general, The Monk is exiting adventure that combines the best elements of genre metroidvania with cyberpunk style

content_descriptors.notes: The game contain blood and fights
